channel.title: Download all widgets present in a Dashboard to a single PDF
channel.description: Hi, Is it possible to have a feature of having entire dashboard widgets downloaded to a single PDF. Requirement is to have a 'Download as PDF' button to download entire dashboard as a PDF.

item.title: Download all widgets present in a Dashboard to a single PDF
item.dc:creator: saravanpa-aot
item.description:
Hello @neeraj any luck with this? did you happen to solve this?

Read full topic

item.title: Download all widgets present in a Dashboard to a single PDF
item.dc:creator: neeraj
item.description:
Hi,
Is it possible to have a feature of having entire dashboard widgets downloaded to a single PDF.
Requirement is to have a ‘Download as PDF’ button to download entire dashboard as a PDF.

Read full topic
item.source: Download all widgets present in a Dashboard to a single PDF
